availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1863-1867

body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky
Hancock County Court Sct
Special april Term 1864

It appearing theo the Satisfaction of the court that the certificates of Election for District No. 3, at the may Election 1863, and for district No 4 at the August Election 1863 as regards magistrates & constable were made wrong as to No of District, ordered therefore that the same be corrected by the proper persons authorized to compare poles, and certified to the Secretary of State

A Copy attest
Eldred E Pate Clerk
Hancock Coty Ct
